emailTemplate.name: forum_threadmoved_tracking
emailTemplate.subject: $core_v2_configuration.SiteName: $core_v2_forum.Current.Name: $core_v2_forumThread.Current.Subject moved
emailTemplate.htmlBody:
#set($forum = $core_v2_forum.Current) #set($post = $core_v2_forumThread.Current)
The following thread was moved:

Subject: $post.Subject
Moved to: $forum.Name

You were sent this email because you opted to receive email notifications for this Q&A forum or thread. You can view this thread online.

To unsubscribe from only this thread, disable email notifications online. To disable all email notifications from $core_v2_configuration.SiteName, navigate to "Settings", click on the "Email" tab, then under the "Email configuration" section, set "Send notifications" to "No".
emailTemplate.textBody:
#set($forum = $core_v2_forum.Current) #set($post = $core_v2_forumThread.Current)
The following thread was moved:
Subject: $email_utility.RenderText($post.Subject) Moved to: $email_utility.RenderText($forum.Name) Number of replies: $post.ReplyCount Link: $core_v2_forumUrls.Thread($post.Id)
-- You were sent this email because you opted to receive email notifications for this Q&A or thread.
To unsubscribe from: - ...only this thread, disable notifications at $core_v2_forumUrls.Thread($post.Id). - ...all email notifications from $core_v2_configuration.SiteName, navigate to "Settings", click on the "Email" tab, then under the "Email configuration" section, set Send notifications to "No".
